communities for mown lawns, which are
sterile, high-maintenance, thirsty and of
low ecological benefit.

groups responsible for our public spaces

increasing the burden on already stretched
resources. But when we’re truly getting out

adapt entrenched operation regimes.

solutions we use are more engineered and
